topic.name: Principles of Art Criticism
topic.sub_subject_name: Art History, Aesthetic Philosophy & Christian Worldview
topic.description: 13-year academic progression (K-12) for Principles of Art Criticism in Fine Arts

objectives.sub_subject_name: Art History, Aesthetic Philosophy & Christian Worldview
objectives.objective_text: Identify lines that point to things.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Art History, Aesthetic Philosophy & Christian Worldview
objectives.objective_text: Name the most important part (Focal Point).

objectives.sub_subject_name: Art History, Aesthetic Philosophy & Christian Worldview
objectives.objective_text: Identify the mood created by colors.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Art History, Aesthetic Philosophy & Christian Worldview
objectives.objective_text: Identify if the picture is old or new.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Art History, Aesthetic Philosophy & Christian Worldview
objectives.objective_text: Name the artist if known.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Art History, Aesthetic Philosophy & Christian Worldview
objectives.objective_text: Identify the time period.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Art History, Aesthetic Philosophy & Christian Worldview
objectives.objective_text: Identify colors and shapes.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Art History, Aesthetic Philosophy & Christian Worldview
objectives.objective_text: Name the people or animals.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Art History, Aesthetic Philosophy & Christian Worldview
objectives.objective_text: Identify the setting.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Art History, Aesthetic Philosophy & Christian Worldview
objectives.objective_text: Identify how the people feel.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Art History, Aesthetic Philosophy & Christian Worldview
objectives.objective_text: Identify the emotion of the piece.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Art History, Aesthetic Philosophy & Christian Worldview
objectives.objective_text: Identify if the artist worked hard.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Art History, Aesthetic Philosophy & Christian Worldview
objectives.objective_text: Recall patterns.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Art History, Aesthetic Philosophy & Christian Worldview
objectives.objective_text: Observe if the picture feels balanced.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Art History, Aesthetic Philosophy & Christian Worldview
objectives.objective_text: Recall that people dressed differently long ago.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Art History, Aesthetic Philosophy & Christian Worldview
objectives.objective_text: Observe clues about where the picture is from.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Art History, Aesthetic Philosophy & Christian Worldview
objectives.objective_text: List the things in the picture.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Art History, Aesthetic Philosophy & Christian Worldview
objectives.objective_text: Observe big and small things.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Art History, Aesthetic Philosophy & Christian Worldview
objectives.objective_text: Observe clues in the picture.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Art History, Aesthetic Philosophy & Christian Worldview
objectives.objective_text: Recall that it's okay to have different favorites.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Art History, Aesthetic Philosophy & Christian Worldview
objectives.objective_text: Summarize how the artist moves your eye.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Art History, Aesthetic Philosophy & Christian Worldview
objectives.objective_text: Explain the use of contrast (light vs. dark).

objectives.sub_subject_name: Art History, Aesthetic Philosophy & Christian Worldview
objectives.objective_text: Explain color relationships.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Art History, Aesthetic Philosophy & Christian Worldview
objectives.objective_text: Defend the artist's choices.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Art History, Aesthetic Philosophy & Christian Worldview
objectives.objective_text: Summarize the life of the artist.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Art History, Aesthetic Philosophy & Christian Worldview
objectives.objective_text: Explain how history changed the art (e.g., war).

objectives.sub_subject_name: Art History, Aesthetic Philosophy & Christian Worldview
objectives.objective_text: Explain the 'Zeitgeist' (Spirit of the Age).

objectives.sub_subject_name: Art History, Aesthetic Philosophy & Christian Worldview
objectives.objective_text: Defend the necessity of context for true understanding.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Art History, Aesthetic Philosophy & Christian Worldview
objectives.objective_text: Summarize the subject matter without guessing the meaning.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Art History, Aesthetic Philosophy & Christian Worldview
objectives.objective_text: Explain the medium (paint, pencil, clay).

objectives.sub_subject_name: Art History, Aesthetic Philosophy & Christian Worldview
objectives.objective_text: Describe the texture.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Art History, Aesthetic Philosophy & Christian Worldview
objectives.objective_text: Explain the difference between description and opinion.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Art History, Aesthetic Philosophy & Christian Worldview
objectives.objective_text: Defend the importance of 'slow looking'.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Art History, Aesthetic Philosophy & Christian Worldview
objectives.objective_text: Tell a story about the picture.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Art History, Aesthetic Philosophy & Christian Worldview
objectives.objective_text: Guess why the artist made it.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Art History, Aesthetic Philosophy & Christian Worldview
objectives.objective_text: Summarize the message of the artwork.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Art History, Aesthetic Philosophy & Christian Worldview
objectives.objective_text: Explain symbols (e.g., a dog means loyalty).

objectives.sub_subject_name: Art History, Aesthetic Philosophy & Christian Worldview
objectives.objective_text: Explain ambiguity in art.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Art History, Aesthetic Philosophy & Christian Worldview
objectives.objective_text: Defend the concept of 'Authorial Intent' vs. 'Reader Response'.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Art History, Aesthetic Philosophy & Christian Worldview
objectives.objective_text: Decide if you like it.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Art History, Aesthetic Philosophy & Christian Worldview
objectives.objective_text: Say why you like it or don't.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Art History, Aesthetic Philosophy & Christian Worldview
objectives.objective_text: Summarize what makes a piece 'successful'.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Art History, Aesthetic Philosophy & Christian Worldview
objectives.objective_text: Explain the difference between 'I like it' and 'It is good'.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Art History, Aesthetic Philosophy & Christian Worldview
objectives.objective_text: Explain the criteria for judgment.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Art History, Aesthetic Philosophy & Christian Worldview
objectives.objective_text: Defend a judgment using objective criteria.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Art History, Aesthetic Philosophy & Christian Worldview
objectives.objective_text: Connect vocabulary words to the description.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Art History, Aesthetic Philosophy & Christian Worldview
objectives.objective_text: Compare the background and foreground.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Art History, Aesthetic Philosophy & Christian Worldview
objectives.objective_text: Analyze the Principles of Design (Balance, Rhythm, Unity).

objectives.sub_subject_name: Art History, Aesthetic Philosophy & Christian Worldview
objectives.objective_text: Interpret the compositional structure.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Art History, Aesthetic Philosophy & Christian Worldview
objectives.objective_text: Connect the technique to the effect.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Art History, Aesthetic Philosophy & Christian Worldview
objectives.objective_text: Compare art from two different countries.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Art History, Aesthetic Philosophy & Christian Worldview
objectives.objective_text: Analyze the social and political context.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Art History, Aesthetic Philosophy & Christian Worldview
objectives.objective_text: Interpret how the artist's biography influenced the work.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Art History, Aesthetic Philosophy & Christian Worldview
objectives.objective_text: Connect the art to other events (inventions, revolutions).

objectives.sub_subject_name: Art History, Aesthetic Philosophy & Christian Worldview
objectives.objective_text: Analyze the literal qualities of the work.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Art History, Aesthetic Philosophy & Christian Worldview
objectives.objective_text: Interpret the technical skill involved.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Art History, Aesthetic Philosophy & Christian Worldview
objectives.objective_text: Compare your idea with a friend's idea.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Art History, Aesthetic Philosophy & Christian Worldview
objectives.objective_text: Analyze the metaphors and allegories.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Art History, Aesthetic Philosophy & Christian Worldview
objectives.objective_text: Interpret the work based on visual evidence.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Art History, Aesthetic Philosophy & Christian Worldview
objectives.objective_text: Connect the title to the meaning.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Art History, Aesthetic Philosophy & Christian Worldview
objectives.objective_text: Compare a masterpiece with a doodle.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Art History, Aesthetic Philosophy & Christian Worldview
objectives.objective_text: Analyze the work based on different theories (Imitationalism, Formalism, Emotionalism).

objectives.sub_subject_name: Art History, Aesthetic Philosophy & Christian Worldview
objectives.objective_text: Interpret the lasting value of the work.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Art History, Aesthetic Philosophy & Christian Worldview
objectives.objective_text: Connect the work to the canon of art history.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Art History, Aesthetic Philosophy & Christian Worldview
objectives.objective_text: Evaluate the success of the composition.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Art History, Aesthetic Philosophy & Christian Worldview
objectives.objective_text: Evaluate the accuracy of observation.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Art History, Aesthetic Philosophy & Christian Worldview
objectives.objective_text: Evaluate competing interpretations.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Art History, Aesthetic Philosophy & Christian Worldview
objectives.objective_text: Judge the skill of the artist.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Art History, Aesthetic Philosophy & Christian Worldview
objectives.objective_text: Evaluate the work's contribution to the field.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Art History, Aesthetic Philosophy & Christian Worldview
objectives.objective_text: Construct a formal analysis of a masterwork.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Art History, Aesthetic Philosophy & Christian Worldview
objectives.objective_text: Synthesize the relationship between form and content.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Art History, Aesthetic Philosophy & Christian Worldview
objectives.objective_text: Construct a research paper on the provenance and context of a work.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Art History, Aesthetic Philosophy & Christian Worldview
objectives.objective_text: Synthesize biography, history, and philosophy in criticism.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Art History, Aesthetic Philosophy & Christian Worldview
objectives.objective_text: Construct a detailed inventory of visual elements.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Art History, Aesthetic Philosophy & Christian Worldview
objectives.objective_text: Synthesize observation into a formal statement.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Art History, Aesthetic Philosophy & Christian Worldview
objectives.objective_text: Construct a hermeneutic argument for the work's meaning.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Art History, Aesthetic Philosophy & Christian Worldview
objectives.objective_text: Synthesize context and content to find meaning.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Art History, Aesthetic Philosophy & Christian Worldview
objectives.objective_text: Construct a critical review of an artwork.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Art History, Aesthetic Philosophy & Christian Worldview
objectives.objective_text: Synthesize aesthetic theory with personal response.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Art History, Aesthetic Philosophy & Christian Worldview
objectives.objective_text: Evaluate the impact of patronage and economics.
